plan.text: Set up a daily scheduled task to run at 9am UTC
Fetch top AI trending articles from a reliable source
Summarize the articles into a concise thread format
Post the summary thread as a tweet
Log the activity and article details to Google Sheets

questions.label: Which source would you like to use for fetching top AI trending articles?
How many top articles would you like to summarize each day?
What should be the approximate length of each article summary in the tweet thread?

discoveries.title: A scheduling service is needed to trigger the task daily at 9am UTC
AI-powered summarization may be beneficial for creating concise article summaries
